description: The 'xzibit_plugins_joined' dataset provides a comprehensive overview of projects and plugins, focusing on their management and usage within an organization. It includes detailed information about each project, such as unique identifiers, ownership, location, and status, as well as metadata like descriptive names and modification timestamps. Additionally, the dataset captures whether a project is a tutorial and includes free-text descriptions for context. The dataset also tracks plugin details, including identifiers, names, descriptions, authors, and versions, along with their usage across projects. This dataset is particularly useful for administrators and developers who need to manage and track project and plugin usage, ensuring efficient collaboration and resource allocation. It can be used to analyze project hierarchies, monitor development status, and assess the impact of plugins across different projects. The inclusion of JSON arrays for contributors and tags allows for flexible categorization and search capabilities, enhancing the dataset's utility in project management and decision-making processes.
shortDesc: Dataset of project and plugin details for tracking and management.

columns.name: projectKey
columns.comment: Unique identifier for each project, key for tracking.

columns.name: ownerLogin
columns.comment: Username of the project owner, indicates administrator.

columns.name: projectLocation
columns.comment: JSON array detailing project hierarchy and location.

columns.name: tutorialProject
columns.comment: Boolean indicating if the project is a tutorial.

columns.name: name
columns.comment: Descriptive name of the project, for identification.

columns.name: projectStatus
columns.comment: Current status of the project, e.g., Sandbox.

columns.name: contributors
columns.comment: JSON array of project contributors, tracks collaboration.

columns.name: lastModifiedOn
columns.comment: Timestamp of last modification, tracks updates.

columns.name: shortDesc
columns.comment: Free-text description of the project, provides context.

columns.name: tags
columns.comment: JSON array of tags for categorization and search.

columns.name: isDev
columns.comment: Indicates if the plugin is in development.

columns.name: description
columns.comment: Detailed explanation of the plugin's functionality.

columns.name: author
columns.comment: Creator or maintainer of the plugin.

columns.name: project_usages
columns.comment: Projects where the plugin is used.

columns.name: total_usages
columns.comment: Total number of times the plugin is used.
